page.title: 13SHARPSTONES QUARRY
page.content: {Sharpstones Quarry}situated to the south of{Shrewsbury}is quarried by {Tarmac Roadstone Weston Ltd.}who quarry stone for the following purposes:- 1.{25O,OOO}tons extracted each year is used by{British Rail}for rail ballast. This is{25%}of the rock produced. 2.{15O,OOO}tons is produced for strengthening road surfaces with bitumen covered chippings. 3.{15O,OOO}tons of sub base stone is quarried for road building. 4. Other companies are supplied with {2OO,OOO}tons for other purposes. 5. Tarmacadam is produced for roads and playgrounds. 6. Stone is also produced for ready mixed concrete and drainage. The total annual production of{9OO,OOO}tons is eating away{Sharpstones Hill}and is spoiling the landscape.
